greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of K(k) * (6 * E(k) - (1 + 4*k'^2) * K(k)) / (Pi/2)^2 in powers of q where E(k), K(k) are complete elliptic integrals and q = exp(-Pi * K(k') / K(k)).
formula: Expansion of -(P(q) - 6 * P(q^2) + 4 * P(q^4)) in powers of q where P() is a Ramanujan Lambert series. - _Michael Somos_, Apr 07 2015
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 1, Boole[n == 0], -(-1)^n 24 DivisorSigma[ 1, n]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Apr 07 2015 *)
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Aug 09 2008
